answers.answer: He needs a good check up to make sure his meds are working alright and check him for thyroid, depression, vitamins to say the least.  If his regular doctor won't pay attention to his needs get his files and find a new doctor.
Anyone taking Avandia should definately rethink this, especially if they have heart disease, in light of the new findings. see http://www.avandia-suit.com

question: Hi,My husband has diabetes, but in the last year he seem's to change.Can diabetes cause depression. He takes Cretor, and Avandia and he think's since he started taken them he has change. He is always tired i and family member see a change. And his work but he did no. I don't think his dr. is helping and I want him to find another one.Could it be the med or depression goes with diabetes.
title: Is there a problem
